items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just WOW!
items.body: LOVE. THIS. DRESS! Good quality fabric and construction, and a very flattering and forgiving fit. The ruching drapes beautifully and the one-shoulder design is done so well. One-shoulder and off-the-shoulder look is so popular this year, but I've found that the fabrics are too stiff and the look just doesn't work. The minute I put this on, I knew it was a winner. It hugs my shoulders (which are pretty wide) very well and doesn't fall too low on the "off" shoulder. The neckline is just lovely. I always wear a "medium" in the Prettygarden brand and although some reviewers said it runs big, I did order the medium and am very pleased with the fit. I'm 5/8", 140 lbs and I think if I'd downsized to the small, it might go from looking elegant to a little bit trashy. The length in the medium ends up right at my ankles for a "tea length" look. I ordered the Rust Red and the color is very true to what you see onscreen, but I'm exchanging it for the Army Green which appears to be a nice neutral green (rather than an army "olive drab.") I'll be dressing it it up with strappy gold sandals, simple gold jewelry a gold clutch and plan to make a glamorous entrance as stepmom-of-the-bride at an October wedding. Waste no time, shoppers! Order this dress today. It's a great style for an unbelievably great price! Read more
items.author: Happy in the Heights

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress for pregnancy and SO comfortable!
items.body: Love! So stretchy and fit my 20 week pregnancy bump. The ruching around the waist allowed my baby bump to fit in the dress perfectly. I purchased size medium to ensure the length would be long enough with the bump and it was great. Very comfortable dress. I was never uncomfortable in it. Only issue is because it’s very tight around the waist (although extremely comfortable) you can see panty lines. I’m assuming if I wore it in a different color, you’d not be able to wear underwear. For around $30, this was an incredible purchase for the price! Definitely will consider buying again in another color. And I love that I can wear it again while not pregnant because this dress was not a maternity dress but was extremely accommodating of a baby bump. Read more
items.author: Alison Loving

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: I needed a dress for a white party and this was a great find! Fit well and quality was good. It also looked great in! Read more
items.author: Chellie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress for the money
items.body: Outstanding fit, flattering and comfortable, packs beautifully with minimal wrinkles. The fabric feels quality, the cut looks polished, and it transitions from day to night with ease. Love it, highly recommend if you want pure class at a great price. Read more
items.author: Cheri Comfort

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and comfortable
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress. It is made of a nice breathable fabric that looks very classy. It was the perfect dress for my graduation Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy if you like your wear undergarments to show
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This color is amazing, fit is amazing, fabric is ok; however, I could see the outline of all my undergarments. I don't see how it can be worn with anything underneath without the outlines being seen. So, unfortunately was a return from me. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a 10
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. So comfortable and fits true to size. I received several compliments at the wedding I attended. Read more
items.author: Teri O'Brien

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars See through
items.body: There's no lining in the back of the dress so you can see everything!! The style is pretty but with a white dress, having lining built in the dress would've made it perfect! Read more
items.author: Andrea Simon

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Sleeveless Maxi Ruched One Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Sleeveless Maxi Ruched One Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Bright Blue, Lake Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
